name: NumTrip：Number Puzzle Games
description:
Magical fun digital merge game
Game Features:
-Cartoon cute style
-Rules are simple and easy to understand
-Click merge to upgrade
-Boutique puzzle decompression

The board is covered with different number pieces. When the same two same number pieces are adjacent, you can click any one of them to merge them. Two identical pieces can be combined into a new one. The more you play, the more difficult you are. What are you waiting for? Come accept the challenge and merge more advanced pieces!

In this update we fixed several minor bugs and made some improvements.We hope you enjoy it! Contact us in case you have feedback or any questions!
